Text: Thanks, enjoyed it very much, I wonder was it only one episode or is there a modern version of the whole series? Have a nice day! Love Emerald

ladyemerald, this is a one-off.  Of course word of a remake could be just around the corner. They are all the rage with major networks these years. Not that i think this is the case with The Time Tunnel but we can all hope and guess. Maybe one day.
